title: El Barco
subtitle: The Boat
meta_desc: Learn about boats in Spanish (barco, navegar, mar, olas) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish transportation, el barco Spanish, boat in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: El Barco
